parameters.name: Exclude
parameters.description: True to exclude it, false to not

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the names of configurations for which to set Exclude; null or Nothing if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts.swAllConfiguration or swInConfigurationOpts.swThisConfiguration

title: IComponent2.SetExcludeFromBOM2
description: Sets whether to exclude this component from the bills of materials (BOMs) in the specified configurations.
signature:
System.Int32 SetExcludeFromBOM2( 
   System.Boolean
Exclude
,
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Exclude
parameters.description: True to exclude it, false to not

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the names of configurations for which to set Exclude; null or Nothing if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts.swAllConfiguration or swInConfigurationOpts.swThisConfiguration

returns: Return code as defined in swExcludeFromBOMError_e
remarks:
This method is valid only for
table-based bills of materials
; it does not work for Microsoft Excel-based bills of materials.
If you set Exclude to true, the name of the component changes in the FeatureManager design tree of the specified configuration;
(Excluded from BOM)
is appended. To update the FeatureManager design tree, call
IFeatureManager::UpdateFeatureTree
.
